80 void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAInit (void)
81 {
82  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex = 0;
83  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex = 0;
84 
85  /* Populate the LVDS Stream HW Session EDMA Channel Table: */
86  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_0;
87  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
88  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_1;
89  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
90  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_2;
91  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_2;
92  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[3].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_3;
93  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[3].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_3;
94  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[4].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_4;
95  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[4].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_4;
96  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[5].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_5;
97  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[5].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_5;
98  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[6].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_6;
99  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[6].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_6;
100  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[7].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_7;
101  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[7].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_7;
102  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[8].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_8;
103  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[8].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_8;
104  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[9].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_9;
105  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[9].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_9;
106  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[10].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_10;
107  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[10].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_10;
108 
109  /* Populate the LVDS Stream SW Session EDMA Channel Table: */
110  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_0;
111  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[0].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
112  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_1;
113  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[1].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
114  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_CH_2;
115  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swSessionEDMAChannelTable[2].shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_2;
116 }
117 
130 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamInit (void)
131 {
132  CBUFF_InitCfg initCfg;
133  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
134  int32_t errCode;
135  Semaphore_Params semParams;
136 
137  /*************************************************************************************
138  * Open the CBUFF Driver:
139  *************************************************************************************/
140  memset ((void *)&initCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_InitCfg));
141 
142  /* Populate the configuration: */
143  initCfg.socHandle = gMmwMCB.socHandle;
144  initCfg.enableECC = 0U;
145  initCfg.crcEnable = 1U;
146  /* Up to 1 SW session + 1 HW session can be configured for each frame. Therefore max session is 2. */
147  initCfg.maxSessions = 2U;
148  initCfg.enableDebugMode = false;
149  initCfg.interface = CBUFF_Interface_LVDS;
150  initCfg.outputDataFmt = CBUFF_OutputDataFmt_16bit;
151  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.crcEnable = 0U;
152  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.msbFirst = 1U;
153  /* Enable all lanes available on the platform*/
154  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.lvdsLaneEnable = 0x3U;
155  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.ddrClockMode = 1U;
156  initCfg.u.lvdsCfg.ddrClockModeMux = 1U;
157 
158  /* Initialize the CBUFF Driver: */
159  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle = CBUFF_init (&initCfg, &errCode);
160  if (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle == NULL)
161  {
162  /* Error: Unable to initialize the CBUFF Driver */
163  System_printf("Error: CBUFF_init failed with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
164  goto exit;
165  }
166 
167  /* Initialize the HSI Header Module: */
168  if (HSIHeader_init (&initCfg, &errCode) < 0)
169  {
170  /* Error: Unable to initialize the HSI Header Module */
171  System_printf("Error: HSIHeader_init failed with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
172  goto exit;
173  }
174 
175  /* Populate EDMA resources */
176  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAInit();
177 
178  /* Initialize semaphores */
179  Semaphore_Params_init(&semParams);
180  semParams.mode = Semaphore_Mode_BINARY;
181  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneSemHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
182  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneSemHandle = Semaphore_create(0, &semParams, NULL);
183 
184  /* Check some assumptions about s/w session regarding sizes for user buffer which
185  * are going to stream out in CBUFF units so must be even number of bytes */
186  MmwDemo_debugAssert((sizeof(MmwDemo_LVDSUserDataHeader_t) & 1) == 0);
187  MmwDemo_debugAssert((sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudCartesian) & 1) == 0);
188  MmwDemo_debugAssert((sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo) & 1) == 0);
189 
190  retVal = 0;
191 
192 exit:
193  return retVal;
194 }
195 
207 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel
208 (
209  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
210  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
211 )
212 {
213  if(ptrEDMAInfo->dmaNum == 0)
214  {
215  ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0;
216  ptrEDMACfg->shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_0;
217  }
218  else if(ptrEDMAInfo->dmaNum == 1)
219  {
220  ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1;
221  ptrEDMACfg->shadowLinkChannelsId = MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_SHADOW_CH_1;
222  }
223  else
224  {
225  /* Max of 2 CBUFF sessions can be configured*/
226  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
227  }
228 }
229 
246 static int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFHwChannel
247 (
248  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
249  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
250 )
251 {
252  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
253  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
254 
255  if(ptrEDMAInfo->isFirstEDMAChannel)
256  {
257  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel(ptrEDMAInfo, ptrEDMACfg);
258  retVal = 0;
259  }
260  else
261  {
262 
263  /* Sanity Check: Are there sufficient EDMA channels? */
264  if (streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex >= MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL)
265  {
266  /* Error: All the EDMA channels are allocated */
267  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel failed. HW channel index=%d\n",
268  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex);
269  goto exit;
270  }
271 
272  /* Copy over the allocated EDMA configuration. */
273  memcpy ((void *)ptrEDMACfg,
274  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex],
275  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg));
276 
277  /* Increment the allocator index: */
278  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex++;
279 
280  /* EDMA Channel allocated successfully */
281  retVal = 0;
282  }
283 
284 exit:
285  return retVal;
286 }
287 
304 static int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFSwChannel
305 (
306  CBUFF_EDMAInfo* ptrEDMAInfo,
307  CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg
308 )
309 {
310  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
311  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
312 
313  if(ptrEDMAInfo->isFirstEDMAChannel)
314  {
315  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel(ptrEDMAInfo,ptrEDMACfg);
316  retVal = 0;
317  }
318  else
319  {
320  /* Sanity Check: Are there sufficient EDMA channels? */
321  if (streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex >= MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL)
322  {
323  /* Error: All the EDMA channels are allocated */
324  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel failed. SW channel index=%d\n",
325  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex);
326  goto exit;
327  }
328 
329  /* Copy over the allocated EDMA configuration. */
330  memcpy ((void *)ptrEDMACfg,
331  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelTable[streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex],
332  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg));
333 
334  /* Increment the allocator index: */
335  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex++;
336 
337  /* EDMA Channel allocated successfully */
338  retVal = 0;
339  }
340 
341 exit:
342  return retVal;
343 }
344 
354 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFHwChannel (CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg)
355 {
356  uint8_t index;
357  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
358 
359  if((ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0) ||
360  (ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1))
361  {
362  /*This is the CBUFF trigger channel. It is not part of the resource table so
363  nothing needs to be done*/
364  goto exit;
365  }
366 
367  for (index = 0U; index < MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_HW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL; index++)
368  {
369  /* Do we have a match? */
370  if (memcmp ((void*)ptrEDMACfg,
371  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelTable[index],
372  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg)) == 0)
373  {
374  /* Yes: Decrement the HW Session index */
375  streamMCBPtr->hwSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex--;
376  goto exit;
377  }
378  }
379 
380  /* Sanity Check: We should have had a match. An assertion is thrown to indicate that the EDMA channel
381  * being cleaned up does not belong to the table*/
382  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
383 
384 exit:
385  return;
386 }
387 
397 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFSwChannel (CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg* ptrEDMACfg)
398 {
399  uint8_t index;
400  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t *streamMCBPtr = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
401 
402  if((ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_0) ||
403  (ptrEDMACfg->chainChannelsId == MMW_LVDS_STREAM_CBUFF_EDMA_CH_1))
404  {
405  /*This is the CBUFF trigger channel. It is not part of the resource table so
406  nothing needs to be done*/
407  goto exit;
408  }
409 
410  for (index = 0U; index < MMWDEMO_LVDS_STREAM_SW_SESSION_MAX_EDMA_CHANNEL; index++)
411  {
412  /* Do we have a match? */
413  if (memcmp ((void*)ptrEDMACfg,
414  (void*)&streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelTable[index],
415  sizeof(CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg)) == 0)
416  {
417  /* Yes: Decrement the SW Session index */
418  streamMCBPtr->swSessionEDMAChannelAllocatorIndex--;
419  goto exit;
420  }
421  }
422 
423  /* Sanity Check: We should have had a match. An assertion is thrown to indicate that the EDMA channel
424  * being cleaned up does not belong to the table*/
425  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
426 
427 exit:
428  return;
429 }

441 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession (void)
442 {
443  int32_t errCode;
444  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
445 
446  /* Delete session*/
447  if (CBUFF_deleteSession (streamMcb->hwSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
448  {
449  /* Error: Unable to delete the session. */
450  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession CBUFF_deleteSession failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
451  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
452  return;
453  }
454 
455  streamMcb->hwSessionHandle = NULL;
456 
457  /* Did we stream out with the HSI Header? */
458  if (streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated == true)
459  {
460  /* Delete the HSI Header: */
461  if (HSIHeader_deleteHeader (&streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader, &errCode) < 0)
462  {
463  /* Error: Unable to delete the HSI Header */
464  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession HSIHeader_deleteHeader failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
465  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
466  return;
467  }
468 
469  streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated = false;
470  }
471 }
472 
482 void MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession (void)
483 {
484  int32_t errCode;
485  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
486 
487  /* Delete session*/
488  if (CBUFF_deleteSession (streamMcb->swSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
489  {
490  /* Error: Unable to delete the session. */
491  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession CBUFF_deleteSession failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
492  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
493  return;
494  }
495 
496  streamMcb->swSessionHandle = NULL;
497 
498  /* Delete the HSI Header: */
499  if (HSIHeader_deleteHeader (&streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader, &errCode) < 0)
500  {
501  /* Error: Unable to delete the HSI Header */
502  System_printf ("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteSwSession HSIHeader_deleteHeader failed. Error code %d\n", errCode);
503  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
504  return;
505  }
506 }
507 
520 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_HwTriggerFrameDone (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
521 {
522  int32_t errCode;
523 
524  /* Increment stats*/
525  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneCount++;
526 
527  if(sessionHandle != NULL)
528  {
529  /* There are 2 cases to consider:
530  Only one subframe configured (legacy frame):
531  If there is a software session configured for this subframe, we need to
532  deactivate the HW session here.
533 
534  More than one subframe configured:
535  If there is more than one subframe we need to deactivate the HW
536  session here as other subframes may have configured a HW session.
537  In this case (more than one subframe), the HW session is always created
538  and activated in the application code */
539  if((gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.objDetCommonCfg.preStartCommonCfg.numSubFrames > 1) ||
540  (gMmwMCB.subFrameCfg[0].lvdsStreamCfg.isSwEnabled == 1))
541  {
542  if(CBUFF_deactivateSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
543  {
544  /* Error: Unable to deactivate the session. */
545  DebugP_assert(0);
546  return;
547  }
548  }
549  }
550  else
551  {
552  DebugP_assert(0);
553  }
554 
555  Semaphore_post(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwFrameDoneSemHandle);
556 }
557 
570 static void MmwDemo_LVDSStream_SwTriggerFrameDone (CBUFF_SessionHandle sessionHandle)
571 {
572  int32_t errCode;
573 
574  /* Increment stats*/
575  gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneCount++;
576 
577  if(sessionHandle != NULL)
578  {
579  if(CBUFF_deactivateSession (sessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
580  {
581  /* Error: Unable to deactivate the session. */
582  DebugP_assert(0);
583  return;
584  }
585 
586  /*If only one subframe has been configured (legacy frame) and
587  a HW session has been configured for that subframe, we need to
588  enable it here as for the legacy frame the HW is NOT reconfigured
589  every frame.
590  If more than one subframe is configured, the HW
591  session is reconfigured and activated every subframe
592  in the application code, not here.*/
593  if((gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.objDetCommonCfg.preStartCommonCfg.numSubFrames == 1) &&
594  (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL))
595  {
596  if(CBUFF_activateSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &errCode) < 0)
597  {
598  DebugP_assert(0);
599  }
600  }
601  }
602  else
603  {
604  DebugP_assert(0);
605  }
606 
607  Semaphore_post(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.swFrameDoneSemHandle);
608 }
609 
621 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamHwConfig (uint8_t subFrameIndx)
622 {
623  CBUFF_SessionCfg sessionCfg;
624  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
625  int32_t errCode;
626  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
627  MmwDemo_SubFrameCfg *subFrameCfg = &gMmwMCB.subFrameCfg[subFrameIndx];
628 
629  memset ((void*)&sessionCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_SessionCfg));
630 
631  /* Populate the configuration: */
632  sessionCfg.executionMode = CBUFF_SessionExecuteMode_HW;
633  sessionCfg.edmaHandle = gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.edmaHandle[MMW_LVDS_STREAM_EDMA_INSTANCE];
634  sessionCfg.allocateEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFHwChannel;
635  sessionCfg.freeEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFHwChannel;
636  sessionCfg.frameDoneCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_HwTriggerFrameDone;
637  sessionCfg.dataType = CBUFF_DataType_COMPLEX;
638  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataMode = (CBUFF_DataMode)subFrameCfg->adcBufCfg.chInterleave;
639 
640  /* Populate the HW Session configuration: */
641  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.adcBufHandle = gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.adcbufHandle;
642  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.numADCSamples = subFrameCfg->numAdcSamples;
643  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.numChirpsPerFrame = subFrameCfg->numChirpsPerSubFrame;
644  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.chirpMode = subFrameCfg->adcBufCfg.chirpThreshold;
645  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.opMode = CBUFF_OperationalMode_CHIRP;
646 
647  switch(subFrameCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt)
648  {
649  case MMW_DEMO_LVDS_STREAM_CFG_DATAFMT_ADC:
650  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_ADC_DATA;
651  break;
652  case MMW_DEMO_LVDS_STREAM_CFG_DATAFMT_CP_ADC_CQ:
653  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.dataFormat = CBUFF_DataFmt_CP_ADC_CQ;
654  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[0] = 0;
655  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[1] = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(subFrameCfg->sigImgMonTotalSize);
656  sessionCfg.u.hwCfg.cqSize[2] = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(subFrameCfg->satMonTotalSize);
657  break;
658  default:
659  System_printf ("Error: lvdsStreamCfg dataFmt %d is invalid\n", subFrameCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.dataFmt);
660  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
661  break;
662  }
663 
664  if(subFrameCfg->lvdsStreamCfg.isHeaderEnabled)
665  {
666  MmwDemo_debugAssert(streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated == false);
667 
668  /* Create the HSI Header to be used for the HW Session: */
669  if (HSIHeader_createHeader (&sessionCfg, false, &(streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader), &errCode) < 0)
670  {
671  /* Error: Unable to create the HSI Header; report the error */
672  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create HW HSI header with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
673  goto exit;
674  }
675 
676  streamMcb->isHwSessionHSIHeaderAllocated = true;
677 
678  /* Setup the header in the CBUFF session configuration: */
679  sessionCfg.header.size = HSIHeader_getHeaderSize(&streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader);
680  sessionCfg.header.address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->hwSessionHSIHeader);
681  }
682 
683  /* Create the HW Session: */
684  streamMcb->hwSessionHandle = CBUFF_createSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle, &sessionCfg, &errCode);
685 
686  if (streamMcb->hwSessionHandle == NULL)
687  {
688  /* Error: Unable to create the CBUFF hardware session */
689  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create the CBUFF hardware session with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
690  goto exit;
691  }
692 
693  /* Control comes here implies that the LVDS Stream has been configured successfully */
694  retVal = 0;
695 
696 exit:
697  return retVal;
698 }
699 
715 int32_t MmwDemo_LVDSStreamSwConfig (uint32_t numObjOut,
716  DPIF_PointCloudCartesian *objOut,
717  DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo *objOutSideInfo)
718 {
719  CBUFF_SessionCfg sessionCfg;
720  MmwDemo_LVDSStream_MCB_t* streamMcb = &gMmwMCB.lvdsStream;
721  int32_t errCode;
722  int32_t retVal = MINUS_ONE;
723 
724  memset ((void*)&sessionCfg, 0, sizeof(CBUFF_SessionCfg));
725 
726  /* Populate the configuration: */
727  sessionCfg.executionMode = CBUFF_SessionExecuteMode_SW;
728  sessionCfg.edmaHandle = gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.edmaHandle[MMW_LVDS_STREAM_EDMA_INSTANCE];
729  sessionCfg.allocateEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFSwChannel;
730  sessionCfg.freeEDMAChannelFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFSwChannel;
731  sessionCfg.frameDoneCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_LVDSStream_SwTriggerFrameDone;
732  sessionCfg.dataType = CBUFF_DataType_COMPLEX;
733  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[0].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(sizeof(MmwDemo_LVDSUserDataHeader_t));
734  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[0].address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->userDataHeader);
735 
736  /* Note size and addresses have defaulted to 0 due to memset zero initialization above */
737  if(numObjOut != 0)
738  {
739  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(numObjOut * sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudCartesian));
740  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[1].address = (uint32_t)objOut;
741 
742  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[2].size = HSIHeader_toCBUFFUnits(numObjOut * sizeof(DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo));
743  sessionCfg.u.swCfg.userBufferInfo[2].address = (uint32_t)objOutSideInfo;
744  }
745 
746  /* Create the HSI Header to be used for the SW Session: */
747  if (HSIHeader_createHeader (&sessionCfg, true, &(streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader), &errCode) < 0)
748  {
749  /* Error: Unable to create the HSI Header; report the error */
750  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create HW HSI header with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
751  goto exit;
752  }
753 
754  /* Setup the header in the CBUFF session configuration: */
755  sessionCfg.header.size = HSIHeader_getHeaderSize(&streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader);
756  sessionCfg.header.address = (uint32_t)&(streamMcb->swSessionHSIHeader);
757 
758  /* Create the SW Session. */
759  streamMcb->swSessionHandle = CBUFF_createSession (gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.cbuffHandle, &sessionCfg, &errCode);
760 
761  if (streamMcb->swSessionHandle == NULL)
762  {
763  /* Error: Unable to create the CBUFF SW session */
764  System_printf("Error: MmwDemo_LVDSStream_config unable to create the CBUFF SW session with [Error=%d]\n", errCode);
765  goto exit;
766  }
767 
768  /* Control comes here implies that the LVDS Stream has been configured successfully */
769  retVal = 0;
770 
771 exit:
772  return retVal;
773 }
774 
785 void MmwDemo_configLVDSHwData(uint8_t subFrameIndx)
786 {
787  int32_t retVal;
788 
789  /* Delete previous CBUFF HW session if one was configured */
790  if(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle != NULL)
791  {
792  MmwDemo_LVDSStreamDeleteHwSession();
793  }
794 
795  /* Configure HW session */
796  if (MmwDemo_LVDSStreamHwConfig(subFrameIndx) < 0)
797  {
798  System_printf("Failed LVDS stream HW configuration\n");
799  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
800  }
801 
802  /* If HW LVDS stream is enabled, start the session here so that ADC samples will be
803  streamed out as soon as the first chirp samples land on ADC*/
804  if(CBUFF_activateSession(gMmwMCB.lvdsStream.hwSessionHandle, &retVal) < 0)
805  {
806  System_printf("Failed to activate CBUFF session for LVDS stream HW. errCode=%d\n",retVal);
807  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
808  }
809 }
